New Records: Hungary will aim to break an old record if they avoid defeat in their first European Championship preparation match against Turkey, surpassing their previous unbeaten streak of 12 matches set in the early 2000s
Key Match Events: The match between Hungary and Turkey will be played in front of a full house at Puskás Arena, Budapest
Pre-Game Insights: The Hungarian national soccer team has maintained an unbeaten streak since November 17, 2022, with 12 matches played, and will face Turkey in their first 2024 preparation match under the coaching of Marco Rossi
Miscellaneous Highlights: The last team to achieve a comparable streak was the “Golden Team” (“Aranycsapat”), who won 15 of 18 games and drew three after losing the 1954 World Cup final
Others: The fan information page of the Hungarian Football Association advises spectators to arrive at the venue at least one and a half hours before kick-off and to utilize public transportation
